description: Guess Discover did warn me this was dead... ONVIFViewer found my camera but errors out when trying to stream it. Super useful.

There are numerous ways to view the stream over rtsp without needing to enable or setup onvif protocol. The simplest is probably using the VLC that every user already has installed, so there's no need to install additional "viewing" software, and if you additionally can't hide side panel or twice-click to minimize-maximize, than the software is basically rendered useless.

2 stars cause app works but 0 stars for functionality - Waste of time.
summary: Not very usefull if stream can't be recorded

description: Installed on Ubuntu 18.04 from repository after updating flat hub option. App do not start at all :(
I installed it, and I can't run it, there is no icon in applications menu, there is no executable in CLI, dpkg -l | grep onvif does not return anything!

The app didn't found the camera but adding the IP manually and it worked. Sometimes it show a connection error but it works after a retry or two. It coukd be good have a log or something that helps with troubleshooting. Overall, a promisisng App!
summary: Good App a bit unstable yet

description: I attempted both autodiscovery and manual addition of multiple cameras from three different manufacturers using this ONVIF camera viewing app. Unfortunately, I encountered a consistent issue where every camera resulted in a "View error" and failed to load. It's worth noting that all of these cameras function flawlessly when accessed through the ONVIF app on a Windows system. Therefore, it seems that the problem lies with the app itself rather than the cameras.
works well on my cameras: SZsinocam
summary: works well on my cameras: SZsinocam

description: Shame the movement controls are on a pop up window and there are two square buttons (not part of the arrows) which stop the movement (if the movement fix is applied) but it is not clear why there are two, what they are for nor what the fix does. With a little effort this could be a very useful app. Handy to test out Onvif camera.
summary: Works including PTZ but very basic

description: I tested with my two onvif cameras. Automatic search did not work. Manual entry did not work. Demo cameras did not work. Conclusion: The app does not work, duh

It does not perform recording or any functions that would warrant the ONVIf client.
Removing the added camera doesn't appear to be possible.
Installation unter LM 19.3 geht nicht. Also eigentlich 0 STERNE !
summary: Installation unter LM 19.3 geht nicht. Also eigentlich 0 STERNE !

description: Leider keine Verbindung zur Kamera möglich. Somit ohne Funktion.
Hab meine CAM eingebunden wie auf Android und co. auch, nur erhalte ich kein Bild.
Después de un día o dos se congela la imagen, no tiene un botón de refrescar y tengo que reiniciar la aplicación
l'application ne fonctionne pas, même la demo ne marche pas
